function.name: sensor_reading
function.description: Returns the sensor temperature readings for each second by most recent for a given sensor id

limit.description: The number of readings (one per second) to return

function.name: sensor_max_temp
function.description: Returns the maximum temperature recorded by each sensor

sensorid.description: The id of the sensor. If left empty, returns max temperature for all sensors.

limit.description: The number sensors to return max temperature for

function.name: sensor_max_temp_last_minute
function.description: Returns the maximum temperature recorded by each sensor in the last minute

sensorid.description: The id of the sensor. If left empty, returns max temperature for all sensors.

limit.description: The number sensors to return max temperature for
